[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]AqualisBraemar LOC ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public listed company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers marine, engineering and adjusting consultancy services to the renewables, maritime, oil and gas and power sectors, and providing market-leading advice de-risking operations and promoting the energy transition across energy and oceans.

Headquartered in London, the AqualisBraemar LOC Group has offices in all major marine and offshore energy hubs worldwide, with 67 offices across 39 locations in Europe, Africa, Americas, Middle East, Asia, and Australia.

AqualisBraemar LOC Group also unites leading marine, engineering and adjusting consulting companies in their common commitment to driving energy transition across the marine and energy industries. As one group we can provide a more meaningful contribution to sustainable development offshore and onshore.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) is a public company that, through its subsidiaries and associates, offers energy consultancy services to the global oil and gas, wind and solar sectors.
